column4: In Dapper's gedit, when I hit ctrl+q it selects all.  Can someone reproduce this?
carl_, Lets see.
Does anyone know how to get opera working on dapper?
go to the one for dapper and download it than dpkg -i  to install it
There isn't one for dapper.
there was
No kidding.
Can you give me a hand finding it?
i gave you the link
I didn't see it.  Thanks!
http://snapshot.opera.com/unix/Weekly-284/intel-linux/
go download the one that says dapper
Oh you're a god among men
Oh you're awesome.  Thank you very much.  They don't list the dapper install on their download page for beta, that's all.
thats why i made that factoid in ubotu ;)
Thanks.  Have a nice night (and a Happy Memorial Day if you're in the US)
its a good chance here is a command to fix that sudo sed -e 's/us\.//' -i /etc/apt/sources.list
What was wrong with it?
us archives are always ina nd out atleast for me they were
Oh okay thanks.
Does it need to reinstall?
aptitude will install suggested and recommended packages along with the package you want
I have all the packages I want.
sudo apt-get remove deskbar-applet first though
